topic.title: Multiple Rendering Modes for the Same Author Document

section.title: Question
section.p: How can we add multiple buttons, each showing different visualisation mode of the same Author document (by associating additional/different CSS style sheet)?

section.title: Answer
section.p: In the toolbar of the Author mode there is a Styles drop-down menu that contains alternative CSS styles for the same document. To add an alternative CSS stylesheet, , go to Document Type Association, select the document type associated with your documents and press Edit. In the Document Type dialog box that appears, go to the Author tab, and in the CSS subtab add references to alternate CSS stylesheets.

For example, one of the alternate CSS stylesheets that we offer for the DITA document type is located here: [OXYGEN_DIR]/frameworks/dita/css_classed/hideColspec.cssIf you open it, you will see that it imports the main CSS and then adds selectors of its own.
